name: Mage Wars
description:
We had some first times this time - first game with UDK, first in such big team, first for some of us, and first in such mixed group. And first when disk with almost finished version crashes. 16h befor deadline...

We had fun creating this prototype, and we hope you would have fun playing it ;)

Feel free to leave us a comment, mail us at polygon@stud.elka.pw.edu.pl or conntact us via Facebook - http://facebook.com/kntg.polygon or via Twitter http:/twitter.com/kqpa93

Enjoy!
